thread.title: BRIEF-WPX Energy Entered Second Amendment To Second Amended And Restated Credit Agreement

title: BRIEF-WPX Energy Entered Second Amendment To Second Amended And Restated Credit Agreement
text:
April 20, 2018 / 8:29 PM / in 13 minutes BRIEF-WPX Energy Entered Second Amendment To Second Amended And Restated Credit Agreement Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 20 (Reuters) - WPX Energy Inc: 
* WPX ENERGY - ENTERED SECOND AMENDMENT TO SECOND AMENDED AND RESTATED CREDIT AGREEMENT AND FIRST AMENDMENT TO GUARANTY AND COLLATERAL AGREEMENT 
* WPX ENERGY INC - IN SECOND AMENDMENT, AGGREGATE MAXIMUM CREDIT AMOUNT IS INCREASED TO $3.0 BILLION 
* WPX ENERGY SAYS IN SECOND AMENDMENT, BORROWING BASE INCREASED TO $1.8 BILLION, AGGREGATE ELECTED COMMITMENTS INCREASED TO $1.5 BILLION - SEC FILING Source text ( bit.ly/2HFtwsG ) Further company coverage:
